text_to_text.description: An article on the future of quantum computing, exploring its applications in cryptography, with introduction, body, and conclusion, logically structured
A report on global climate change, detailing recent extreme weather events and their impacts, with lead, analysis, and expert comments
An article on black hole formation and characteristics, accessible with illustrative diagrams
An essay recalling childhood in a rural village, describing fields, streams, and old houses, emotionally rich
A tutorial on Python programming basics, covering variables, loops, and functions, clearly structured

text_to_image.description: A painting of a rainy Paris street, pedestrians with umbrellas, streets reflecting lights, in soft blue-yellow tones
A mechanical city scene with giant gears and steam pipes, airships in the sky, in copper and dark brown tones
A scene of Mount Fuji with cherry blossom forests, a samurai standing with a sword, sunset glow in the background
A dreamlike scene with floating clocks and shattered mirrors, purple starry sky background
A desert sunset with a single cactus silhouette, orange-red gradient background
